website_summaries.verdict: A good source of iron with fewer digestive side effects than some competing brands.
pros: Contains 50 milligrams of iron in slow-release form that reduces the likeliness of stomach issues after taking it
cons: A noticeable smell that resembles vinegar was detected in some bottles

customer_reviews.title: Product change... for the worse!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for roughly 2 years and have been very pleased with the results until about a month ago. For some reason the product has changed. The pill size is significantly larger, the color is different and there’s an odd odor as well. The date on the bottle is current so that’s not the issue. At first I didn’t think much of it until I started noticing a change in the way I felt and realized it coincided with the change in this iron supplement. I decided to purchase another bottle in case it was a bad batch but the new bottle was the same. Extremely disappointed. Something isn’t right!
customer_reviews.author: PTAMomof2

customer_reviews.title: poor absorbability
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from severe anemia and am used to taking 2 a day as a maintenance basis. With the current shipment I was up to 4 a day and still experiencing symptoms. I just bought Slow FE and after 18 hours am back to my old self. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the belly, works to raise ferritin levels
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this when I had a very low ferritin level. It's now at a safer level for my health. No stomach problems and easy to swallow. I feel like an idiot that nobody told me not to take it with coffee or calcium and to take it with Vitamin C. Also, don't take it with Thyroid. Who knew? Apparently, not my doctors. I only found out when a physician friend helped me do research.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Work great but gently
customer_reviews.text: I have to take three of these a day due to severe anemia. It has a bit of flavor but not at all unpleasant. The pills are small and easy to swallow. Although they are "slow release" they do, er, "disrupt" my GI tract a bit. As I noted earlier I am taking three times the dosage on the bottle at the direction of my doctor. By taking these pills my blood levels of iron have returned to normal. I think they are also a great value given the important functions they restore.
customer_reviews.author: Amber W.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on the stomach
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I've been using it for probably 10 months to a year. It's much more gentle on my stomach than regular non slow release iron pills. I am anemic and require daily dose of iron, regular iron pills use to make my stomach queasy. With the slow release I dont ber queasy. It's also cheaper than the more popular brand "slow fe". Shipping is always fast and it can be added to your subscription on amazon, where it will ship every month or whatever you specify.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I ever bought Mason iron supplements....
customer_reviews.text: Was taking an iron supplement with 45mg of Ferrous Sulfate that was working fairly well, but thought that the Mason iron supplement with 50mg might be better. WRONG. After a month my energy level was down and stomach distress was up. Switched back to my “old” tablets, and improved within 3 days. Sad to have thrown out my money on the Mason supplements, but happy to throw out the remaining 2 1/2 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: ParisLawrence

customer_reviews.title: YEA!
customer_reviews.text: I am required to take a slow-release iron because anemia runs in my family and without it, I become anemic quickly. After being price gouged by Wal-Mart and having success finding the antihistamines on Amazon, I decided to search for a good slow-release iron and voila. So far, they work great and I still feel like my old perky self.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Change noticed with the iron supplement.
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the bottle I immediately noticed a vinegar smell ? The last bottle I purchased didn't have the smell and I am hesitant to take the supplement. I read where another reviewer had the same experience, or, rather, a similar one.
customer_reviews.author: Sambones

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic anemia. These are DEFINITELY not comparable to Slow FE. I have been taking these every day, along with orange juice or vitamin C, for 2 5 months. I just had another iron deficiency test.done and I am still anemic. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THESE!!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Amador

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as I was diagnosed with acute anemia. I read one review of the vinear smell, but thought that must have been a fluke. I received the 3 pack of bottles, each one I opened smelled of vinegar. As a former pharmacy technician, I know that is not right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work like slow Fe. HG mama approved
customer_reviews.text: I have HG with all of my pregnancies and taking any iron would usually set me off within minutes. These iron tablet are more gentle on my stomach and don't make me nauseous when taken with food. They work just like Slow Fe just for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Brown Family

customer_reviews.title: They are excellent, compares to a much higher priced well known ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used these iron pills for years. They are excellent, compares to a much higher priced well known vitamin. I highly recommend it to anyone needing a slow released iron pill.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M.

customer_reviews.title: great source of iron
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to purchase this in a bottle instead of a blister pack. It is much easier to use them. I also like the larger amount that can be purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Bukwurm

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my cost efficient substitute for Slow Fe, and my doctor approved it. I have had NO stomach upset or GI problems since taking this iron. What a relief! And my iron levels are finally getting better. I will continue to buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: After having been diagnosed with unexplained anemia off and on for the last several year my doctor recommend to take a slow-release iron pill. For a while I took two a day, I am now down to one a day and my blood work is OK again, so in short: It works. Will keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: YesandNo

customer_reviews.title: Missin two out of three bottles.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. The problem is I ordered a three pack and only received one bottle. I want the two additional bottles sent to me as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Dennard Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Did not get my complete order. Received only 1 bottle
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to get three bottles. Only received one bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bisk

customer_reviews.title: Personally I like these pills
customer_reviews.text: Personally I like these pills, at least the quantity to cost since I was buying the CVS generic brand that cost $20 for 30 tablets and these have more milligrams. The downside for me is the metallic taste I have in my mouth, it's awful. I'm sure it's a chemistry thing, they just don't mix well with me, but otherwise I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly B. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Vinegar
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pills and they had a vinegar smell after a few months. I kept them in a climate controlled room with a sealed cap. I am going to have to throw away an almost full bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: Great product. No constipation and overall energy went up within a few days of use. Can't beat the value with the quality of these supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: I can tell the difference within a day or two of taking these that I have more energy and feel better. Good product
customer_reviews.text: The only brand I will buy! I can tell the difference within a day or two of taking these that I have more energy and feel better. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndi1091

customer_reviews.title: Missing bottle seal
customer_reviews.text: In this 3 pack order, not all bottles contained the inner seal under the lid. The previous order was fine. What changed? Should i be concerned and get a replacement from manuf.?
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with constipation with other iron pills. All of them rightly mentioned Gentle on them. My life has changes with Mason Slow release. I take one pill with dinner and have negligible constipation issues.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom who has anemia. She hasn't had any issues with the product and the price is great. Her hemoglobin level has been rising. So far so good. No GI upset either.
customer_reviews.author: Virgie

customer_reviews.title: Vinegar smell...
customer_reviews.text: Why do they smell like vinegar? I'm just not convinced these are what they say they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm anemic and I could tell the difference. My nails stopped breaking and I felt better altogether. Does not upset me stomach even on an empty stomach. Great quality with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow Fe
customer_reviews.text: I have to take Iron 3x a day and was taking Slow Fe and when it was hard to find I had to find a comparable replacement. This Iron, so far, has been just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Burd

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the Tummy!
customer_reviews.text: I need to take a small amount of Iron daily due to low Ferritin blood levels. This product is very similar to Slow FE that I took before. I have a sensitive stomach and this Iron supplement by Mason Vitamins helps my blood levels without any GI upset. It has five stars on my list.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Cowling

customer_reviews.title: As good as Slow-FE
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a much more reasonable price. I take iron daily and have levels checked regularly. This product is the same as Slow-FE without the price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Migs

customer_reviews.title: and do not have added colors like the usual red
customer_reviews.text: Need to take iron. these do not upset stomach, do not constipate. and do not have added colors like the usual red, which causes so many allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Gthanks

customer_reviews.title: Way Cheaper for the Same Pills
customer_reviews.text: I hate to take iron pills but with the tremendous difference in price for the same pills on Amazon as at my local drug store it is a lot easier to swallow them.

customer_reviews.title: The best iron I've come across. Take it daily.
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with anemia for me. I won't take any other iron than this.

customer_reviews.title: 50 mg, compare to Slow FE
customer_reviews.text: From what I can tell, these work great and are just like Slow FE. They are 50 mg of iron each.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Can't find this price for quantity in any store! Doesn't hurt my stomach at all like the quick release ones.

customer_reviews.title: They work well!
customer_reviews.text: These are great vitamins and work just as well as the name brand for a fraction of the cost.

customer_reviews.title: smell is horrible but I like these better than nature made

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I feel much better using this than the product that was not time-release.

customer_reviews.title: I could recommend this to others
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. I could recommend this to others.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Working well for me with little upset to my system. Great value too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: compared to the other products used in the past its a great supplement to your diet no side affects I would greatly recommend this product

customer_reviews.text: great price and gives us the iron we need to stay healthy.

customer_reviews.title: This iron is not as potent as other slow release ...
customer_reviews.text: This iron is not as potent as other slow release products out there. After taking it a couple of weeks, my anemia symptoms returned. I went back to the brand I used prior and the symptoms went away.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My doctor suggested I take iron. She suggested this brand. I have been using it for years.

customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of high quality. The slow release is hard to find in local stores.

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this product for some time - quite pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for some time - quite pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pills are small and easy to swallow not some others hat are like horse pills.😉

customer_reviews.title: No GI disturbance
customer_reviews.text: Heart Dr wanted me on iron-it was 11 different products that didn't work out till I found these. They don't upset my stomach and cause very little constipation so these are working great. I recommend even if you have IBS-whic i do.

customer_reviews.title: Iron Poor Blood Problem
customer_reviews.text: These are just like Slow Fe only MUCH better due to the packing of them in a bottle ... I have to take 4 a day right now until I get my iron count way up.
customer_reviews.author: swtnutns

customer_reviews.title: What a find!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been taking these for 3 days but so far I love them. They are a good size and easy to take. They are a slow release and therefore supposed to be easier on the stomach. I've had no problems since starting on these and I've been taking two a day. I haven't been able to find Slow Fe for ages now and I'm pretty sure they're no longer available. These iron supplements seem even better and the price was great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: My mom and I have been using these vitamins for a long time. My mom was an iron deficient and after using slow release iron pills her numbers improved quickly and stayed within normal range. Very nice and useful product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great iron supplemenr
customer_reviews.text: I have been anemic for years, and regular iron supplements hurt my stomach. These Mason slow release vitamins are awesome. They have helped my iron count go up, and don't hurt my stomach at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles arrived with the top opened and the safety seal broken
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great product. As I am very sensitive I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. As I am very sensitive I needed to get a slow-release iron supplement. This one is perfect. No side affects at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needs iron whenever she gets pregnant. This works well without making her sick.
customer_reviews.author: darby21

customer_reviews.title: Lactose one of the main ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I am lactose intolerant and did not realize until it was too late that these pills are covered in lactose
customer_reviews.author: J. Heffernan

customer_reviews.title: Product went bad before expiration date-vinegar smell
customer_reviews.text: When I went to open my second bottle of a 3 pack, the pills smelled like vinegar. My pharmacist told me that is a sign they have gone bad. This was despite the fact that the product had remained sealed until I used it, it was always stored at room temperature, and had an expiration date well into 2018. (It is July 2017 presently.) And, to top it off, it appears I can't get my money back as the window of returns ended about a month after I bought them. So I have no recourse for a refund, and I can't use the pills as they have gone bad.
customer_reviews.author: Anne T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Ridiculous return of product that was received with broken seals.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd or 3rd time ordering. Seals broke in one bottle of 3. Return policy is drive 70 miles to closest UPS drop off. Replacement is coming. Does it really pay for me to drive that far to return what they sent as defective? My gas would be more than cost of product. Ridiculousness. I love the product however the return sucks. Not my fault seal on bottle was non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to throw them out
customer_reviews.text: They’re an odd color (which shouldn’t be a big deal). But they stink/smell a bit like vinegar. And they caused horrible acid reflux. After one week, I’m throwing them in the trash. The price is right, but not if they’re garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Pricier Options
customer_reviews.text: My doctor has prescribed "Slow FE" for me for years, but I"ve been buying over the counter. I purchased these recently. First, they are yellow in color, not red. That's not important, just unusual. They contain somewhat more iron than other brands, 50 mg instead of 45 mg. I was pleased by that. For any allergy sufferers, one important thing to note is that the first inactive ingredient is Lactose, and the label does warn that dairy byproducts are included in this tablet. For me that is not an issue, but for some, it is. Take note if necessary. Otherwise, this is a great product, and I've suffered no side effects from it.
customer_reviews.author: Marjie, Mother of 9Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Different packaging but same quality supplement
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace another supplement I'm returning because it did not have any noticeable iron content. If you need iron pills for medical reasons such as anemia, this brand has proven reliable for the past several years. I cannot tell the difference between this and the Slow FE brand name version.
customer_reviews.author: rbyteme

customer_reviews.title: No red40! And the slow release works awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very anemic , I’ve taken regular iron pills and they have never helped me. Since I started taking these I’ve had more energy and feel great! I used to pass out sometimes when my period started because my white blood count dropped so low, these have helped me so much!!!! And I love that they do not have red40 in them!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money - DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This product may or may not contain what it says. It does, however, smell of vinegar 1+ month after purchase (stored at room temp with desiccants). I work in a pharmacy. THIS IS NOT OK! I will NEVER purchase any item from Mason Vitamins again!
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: Easy on my stomach
customer_reviews.text: Regular iron pills (that aren't slow release) make my stomach very upset. These are perfect taken with a meal and do NOT upset my very sensitive stomach. That was key for me. I have tried other slow release brands with success also. The price is great on Amazon for 3 or 6 packs as compared to my local drugstores brand.
customer_reviews.author: Loving The North

customer_reviews.title: Only Iron my wife can take during pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: My wife used to get very nauseous when taking iron. So we got these slow release so that she would not get nauseous and she's been able to take it without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Fishy taste
customer_reviews.text: I guess they work, my iron hasn’t been re-tested yet. Value is pretty good, but they taste and smell fishy
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: Like this product very much. Easy to swallow and gently on the stomach. It works for me just like the name brand. I would recommend. Great value as well
customer_reviews.author: kassie

customer_reviews.title: Buy these and save some money
customer_reviews.text: Was using SloFe. Very expensive and the individual packaging was horrible! These are a great price and appear to be just as good as the name brand because my doctor is very happy w/ my bloodwork.

customer_reviews.title: Only got one bottle, not three!
customer_reviews.text: I only got one bottle, not the three that were described. $15 for one bottle is too much! Not sure it's worth returning, though.

customer_reviews.title: A++ No stomach pain and good lab numbers
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about two years and faithfully purchase every 6 months. My hemoglobin and hematocrit have gone to the normal range. I have thalassemia and it's nice to see good numbers without my stomach feeling twisted in knots every evening. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Eisen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dosage and pull size
customer_reviews.text: The challenge for me has been to find the right dosage of slow release iron pills. I take 2 of these a day and they work great. I love the small size and that they come in a three pack.

customer_reviews.title: No stomach upset.
customer_reviews.text: I take these every other day per my doctor's instructions. I have not experienced any stomach issues while using it.

customer_reviews.title: This will work better when taken with a meal
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this for years. It works. Until I retired, I worked in a hospital lab and was a frequent blood and platelet donor, so I know about iron stores and replenishment. This will work better when taken with a meal, just before or just after. Good luck.

product_meta.title: Mason Natural Slow Release Iron, 60 Tablets (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: vegetable vitamins This amino acid is a extended release tablet 5-HTP is a metabolite of L-Tryptophan and precursor of serotonin melatonin Mood booster, natural street and anxiety relief natural mood enhancer and may help control appetite
feature_bullets: IRON SUPPLEMENT: Low iron levels may result in fatigue, dizziness, headaches, & other symptoms.* Supplementing your diet with additional iron may help support red blood cell formation & boost energy.*

GENTLE & EFFECTIVE: Our slow-release, high-potency formula helps you get the most possible benefits from this supplement. With 60% less incidence of GI side effects, our iron is gentle on your system.

QUALITY SUPPLEMENTS: Many essential minerals & nutrients are missing from modern diets. Taking a quality, daily dietary supplement can help support your body's general health & wellness. Always discuss any health concerns with a doctor.

HEALTHY FAMILIES: We know your family's health is important to you, so we've developed high-quality vitamins & supplements for adults & kids. From herbal supplements to women's health, to multivitamins, you can trust our high standards.

TRUST & INNOVATION: Since 1967 we've developed high quality vitamins & supplements for the whole family. Over the years we have continued to innovate, adding over 400 products to our expanding line in order to fit your health needs.
